mapper.select:
select count(1) from ( SELECT DISTINCT tcc.cid, tcc.region, tpcl.oneheader, tpcl.twoheader, tpcl.threeheader, tpcl.fourheader, tpcl.fiveheader, tpcl.sixheader, (select cname from tb_dept_user where uid=tpcl.oneheader limit 1) sales, tcc.status, tcl.cname, tcl.manager, tcl.region, tdu.cname username, tdu.phone userphone, ( SELECT dictvalue FROM tb_company_property WHERE cid = tcc.cid AND typeid = 't111111' limit 1) companyLevel, tcl.authid, tcl.logo, tcl.relmail, tci.address FROM tb_common_company_list tcc INNER JOIN tb_company_list tcl ON tcl.cid = tcc.cid LEFT JOIN tb_private_company_list tpcl ON tcc.cid = tpcl.cid LEFT JOIN tb_dept_user tdu ON tdu.cid = tcc.cid AND tdu.uid = tcl.manager LEFT JOIN tb_company_property tcp ON tcp.cid = tcc.cid LEFT JOIN tb_company_info tci ON tcl.cid = tci.cid WHERE tcc.status = '2' and tpcl.status = '1' ) a where 1=1
and (a.oneheader = #{uid} or a.twoheader = #{uid} or a.threeheader = #{uid} or a.fourheader = #{uid} or a.fiveheader = #{uid} or a.sixheader = #{uid})
and a.region IN
#{item.region}
select cname from tb_company_list where cid=#{cid} and status='1'
mapper.update: update tb_company_list set cname=#{cname} ,region=#{region} where cid=#{cid}
update tb_company_list set cname=#{cname}, region=#{region}, relperson=#{relperson}, relphone=#{relphone}, updtime=#{updtime} where cid = #{cid}

update tb_common_company_list set status='2' where cid=#{cid};
insert into tb_private_company_list (cid,tracktype, oneheader,twoheader,threeheader,fourheader,fiveheader,sixheader,status,addtime) values (#{cid},1, #{uid}, null, #{uid}, null, #{uid}, null, #{uid}, null, #{uid}, null, #{uid}, null, 1,#{addtime});
update tb_common_company_list set status='1' where cid=#{cid} and status = '2'; update tb_private_company_list set status = '4' WHERE cid = #{cid} and status = '1'

update tb_company_list set
cname = #{cname},
nickname = #{nickname},
region = #{region},
uscc = #{uscc},
idx = #{idx},
relperson = #{relperson},
relphone = #{relphone},
telephone = #{telephone},
relmail = #{relmail},
reguid = #{reguid},
regtime = #{regtime},
manager = #{manager},
logo = #{logo},
photo = #{photo},
authid = #{authid},
ouid = #{ouid},
upduid = #{upduid},
status = #{status},
summary = #{summary},
oldcid = #{oldcid},
updtime=#{updtime} where cid = #{cid};
mapper.select: select cid ,oneheader,twoheader,threeheader,fourheader,fiveheader,sixheader from tb_private_company_list where cid = #{cid} and status = '1'
mapper.update: update tb_private_company_list set oneheader = #{oneheader}, oneheader = null, twoheader = #{twoheader}, twoheader = null, threeheader = #{threeheader}, threeheader = null, fourheader = #{fourheader}, fourheader = null, fiveheader = #{fiveheader}, fiveheader = null, sixheader = #{sixheader}, sixheader = null, updtime = #{updtime} where cid = #{cid} and status = '1'
update tb_common_company_list set status = '1' where cid = #{cid} and status = '2'; update tb_private_company_list set status = '2' where cid = #{cid} and status = '1' ;
mapper.select:
select count(1) from ( SELECT DISTINCT tcc.cid, tpcl.oneheader, (select cname from tb_dept_user where uid=tpcl.oneheader limit 1) sales, tcc.status, tcl.cname, tcl.manager, tcl.region, tdu.cname username, tdu.phone userphone, ( SELECT dictvalue FROM tb_company_property WHERE cid = tcc.cid AND typeid = 't111111' limit 1) companyLevel, tcl.authid, tcl.logo, tcl.relmail, tci.address FROM tb_common_company_list tcc INNER JOIN tb_company_list tcl ON tcl.cid = tcc.cid LEFT JOIN tb_private_company_list tpcl ON tcc.cid = tpcl.cid LEFT JOIN tb_dept_user tdu ON tdu.cid = tcc.cid AND tdu.uid = tcl.manager LEFT JOIN tb_company_property tcp ON tcp.cid = tcc.cid LEFT JOIN tb_company_info tci ON tcl.cid = tci.cid WHERE tcc.status = '2' and tpcl.status = '2' ) a where 1=1
and a.oneheader = #{uid}
